message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a great price!
I appreciate your offer, but $120 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $85 for the product.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105.
I'm still interested in the product, but $105 is still a bit out of my budget. How about we meet in the middle at $95?
I'm willing to be flexible, but I think $100 is the minimum I can go. What do you think?
